code: const getDayString={0:"Sunday",1:"Monday",2:"Tuesday",3:"Wednesday",4:"Thursday",5:"Friday",6:"Saturday"};export default(dayGap,date)=>{const currentDay=new Date().getDay();switch(true){case dayGap===1:return"Today";case dayGap===2:return"Yesterday";case dayGap>=3&&dayGap<=6:return getDayString[date.getDay()];case dayGap>6:return`${date.getDate()}/${date.getMonth()+1}/${date.getYear()+1900} `;}};
